pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Curl Flex Shine Creme 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf Extra Care Curl Shine Crème provides a long-lasting hold for perfect definition.

Curl Flex Creme.

Its curl-enhancing formula provides 60% longer lasting,m defined curls full of bounce and elasticity.

Extra Care - Style & Protect.

- 24 extra strong hold.

- The caring formula protects the hair during styling.

- Lightweight, without stickiness & easy to brush out.

Size: 150mL

Hair Type: Curls

Ingredients

Water, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, Cyclomethicone, PEG/PPG-15/15 Dimethicone, Polyacrylamide, Bis-Phenylpropyl Dimethicone, C12-14 Isoparaffin, PDG-40 Hydrogenated Castro Oil, Methyoxy PEG/PPG-7/3 Aminopropyl, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Aminodimethicone, Fragrance, Panthenol, Laureth-7, Benzophenone-4, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Cetrimonium Chloride, Trideceth-12, Citronello Geraniol.

Directions

Apply to towel dried hair and shape your curls as desired.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
